eventName: So Long, Adele: Home Away From Home
storyInfo: The residents of Fashion Street oppose relocation despite Costa's attempts to persuade them. At the Volcano Museum, Eyjafjalla receives a letter with no return address, including a photo of the volcano where her parents were killed. It seems to be a letter from her father, arriving several years late.

attributes.content: Good morning, Siesta. Today is August 16, 1099.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: The humidity is 75%, visibility 18km, wind's blowing south-southwest.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Estimated fifteen days until volcanic eruption.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: While it's a fine day outside, we would like to remind everyone to refrain from going into the water beyond the coast outside the nomadic city.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Remember that the calm surface of the sea hides countless hidden reefs and undercurrents, just like the many troubles beneath the surface of a calm life.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Here's a little pick-me-up for this sunny morning: Life Always Goes On, brought to you by the Bonez n' Bonez band.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: 7am, wake from a dream, kissing the one I love ♪
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Open my eyes, same old story, sunlight and trouble after me ♪
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Welcome, our first customer of the day... as expected.
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Are you bringing me any better news than an erupting volcano this fine morning?
attributes.name: Stylish Shopkeeper

attributes.content: The news I bring wouldn't be so bad if you would be less stubborn, Harley, ma'am.
attributes.name: Tired Government Employee

attributes.content: Don't call me ma'am. I'm not that old.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: I'll give you a few minutes, just because it's nice outside. What's the story this time?
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Employment subsidies and tax breaks?
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: Forget it.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: And what 'employment' are you talking about, exactly, when we move to the city center?
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Can't be any worse than a shopping street with no tourists.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: You're not the only one on this street, Harley, and some of your neighbors are willing to sign this memorandum of understanding.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: And I won't be the only one giving you an earful.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: I suggest you people figure out what the folks who live here really want.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Two years ago, Herman told us this bloody volcano was going to blow. Two years later, the volcano is still there, with nothing to show for the trouble that the people of Siesta have had to go through.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Except for guys like you, coming out with a nice job at city hall.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: The 'White Volcano' isn't just a house. It's a home to me and three children.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: We've already had to move once on account of a volcano. Herman can't make us move again, especially when it's not clear he's sober when he tells us to.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Harley, this isn't just one person's home—
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: This is my place, my life ♪
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Don't tell me what to do, or I'm gonna kill you ♪
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: I love this song.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Alright, then, Costa. Or should I say, 'Mr. City Hall'?
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Excuse me... are you still hiring singers?
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: You're looking at a Siesta Volcanic Originium Slug.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Living in a volcanic habitat has caused them to evolve vastly different characteristics and habits from Originium Slugs elsewhere, a matter of considerable interest to biologists.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Interestingly, the activities of these Originium Slugs continue to follow the patterns of Siestan volcanic activity, even though they have been removed from their native habitat and placed in a temperature-controlled box.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: It's a prominent example of how organisms and their environment interact with each other...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Not bad, Eyjafjalla.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Swire! Are you here on vacation?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: You could say that. Here to enjoy a rare summer break.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: What about you? This might be the first time I've seen your researcher side.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I'm just here to help with the museum archives.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: You seem to have the attention of the tourists. I even saw people taking notes. And I have a question for you too.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Would you tell me more about these exhibits?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Am I imagining things, or is Swire more interested in land prices around the museum than the exhibits themselves?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Land prices?
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Mr. Dolly? Why are you...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: No need to look surprised. I came because there are a lot of pictures of volcanoes in this house.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: What is a 'land price'?
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: ...How much you have to pay to get a piece land.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The more prosperous a place is, the more expensive the land tends to be.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Interesting. Humans put a price on land.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Volcanic craters must be the most expensive, then.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Er... not really. Anyway, is it really okay for you to be here with so many people around?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: There's nothing to worry about.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Dolly takes a little leap and lands on Swire's head.
S-Swire!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Hm? What is it?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Why are you looking at me like you've seen a ghost?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Er, it's nothing. Oh, your hat's a little off. Let me fix it for you.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: See, she didn't notice at all.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Isn't that astonishing?
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: (Whisper) It's rude to stand on people's heads!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I know, I know... that's the annoying thing about dealing with you humans.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: It's why only those who interest me can perceive me. Less trouble that way.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: It's getting late. I'll be going. Don't forget our arrangement.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Eyjafjalla? Hello? Eyja?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Oh! Sorry, I got distracted.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Er... Eyja?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Your new nickname. I just came up with it.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Give yourself some time to relax. You're in Siesta, after all. We can go to the hot springs together!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Delivery for the museum—
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Anybody home?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Hello?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Package for the museum. Can you sign for it?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Oh, okay.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: From Leithanien... William University... probably Professor Keller.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The box is filled with documents and samples, with a letter inside.
Half of the envelope is missing, revealing a photo, the edges of which look almost bitten off.
Is this... Mount Unna?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Excuse me!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Is there a problem?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: This letter was sent from Leithanien, and this is the delivery address. Everything should be in order.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Do you know who the sender is? Or when was it sent?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Sorry to bother you, but this is important.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The sender's information should be on the envelope?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Oh, I remember now. There was a letter with a damaged envelope.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: The original Messenger for this batch called in sick. The letter was already like that when I got it. This was the only place I could think of when I saw 'volcano' on the envelope.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: I know as much as you do, if there's no information about the sender on the letter, there's no information.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Sorry to trouble you...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.text: 'How have you been? I'm doing fine here.'
'It's been a long time. I miss you.'
'The volcano is a spectacular sight. The winds are strong at the peak.'

attributes.content: The crooked words behind the photo seem to have been written while wearing thick gloves, making it hard to tell the writer's handwriting habits.
The ink, letter and photo all show clear signs of age.
Looking for something?
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Are there any notes from my father in the museum archives?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Professor Katia? About what?
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Anything, as long as it's his handwriting!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Let's see... Keller left some research materials from William University here, but Professor Katia's focus is on Originium Arts, so I'm not sure there's much about volcanoes...
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: 'Volcanic Plants', 'Originium Energy Conversion in Volcanic Activity', 'Data Model for Volcanic Eruptions'... all notes from Professor Magna.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Wait, this 'Data Model for Volcanic Eruptions' doesn't seem to be Mutti's.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: She opens the notebook, but finds only photocopies of research papers and spreadsheets. A few pages seem to have been ripped out of the end of the notebook.
I don't remember having seen this notebook before.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Me neither... the topic is up Professor Katia's alley, though.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: What are you looking for, Adele? Is it urgent?
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Kahn... can a letter be... delayed, so that it only reaches its destination years later?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: It's not unusual for international mail to be lost, but if you're talking about a delay of several years...
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: A lot of strange things have happened these past couple of days, but I think... if it was sent from Leithanien to 'volcano'...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Maybe I'm overthinking it...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: It's not healthy to shut yourself in a room day after day. You should go take a walk if you feel like your head's not entirely clear. I happen to have something that I need help with.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Do you know what obsidian is?
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Volcanic rock?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Yes. Obsidian mining was once Siesta's main source of income, but it was banned many years ago due to the impact of overexploitation on the environment.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: The ore samples were left behind when Siesta was relocated. The estimated time of eruption may be more accurate if we can find obsidian extracted from the volcano in the past two years.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Not that it has any real meaning, other than to shut the city council up... keep the investors happy, I guess.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: But we can't go near the volcano to collect obsidian samples, can we?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: That's why we need a special channel.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: A what?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Let's just say we'll be dealing with an... eccentric customer.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: That's why I need your help.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Hello...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Welcome to the Obsidian Hot Springs Hotel...
attributes.name: Bored Voice

attributes.content: Bed, meal, or bath? The price list is right there. Just leave the money on the counter and you can go in.
attributes.name: Bored Voice

attributes.content: What a beautiful place!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Why does it have obsidian in the name?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Because obsidian is the soul of Siesta!
attributes.name: Man Becoming Excited

attributes.content: Er... wh-why?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The solid yet refined texture, the rich and warm color... its rare beauty captivates anyone who gazes upon it!
attributes.name: Excited Man

attributes.content: Every piece of obsidian is unique. Do you get it?
attributes.name: Excited Man

attributes.content: It's a treasure of nature, the essence of volcanoes!
attributes.name: Excited Man

attributes.content: Are you interested in obsidian too?
attributes.name: Excited Man

attributes.content: Y-Yes! I am!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Uncouth fools call obsidian a commodity. Commodity! Come, let me show you my collection. No need to be shy! Let me see, shall we start here?
attributes.name: Excited Man

attributes.content: Thank you for the explanation...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: May I ask if you have any obsidian for sale in your collection?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Bored Man

attributes.content: No, absolutely not.
attributes.name: Bored Man

attributes.content: This is a collection. Do you know what a collection is?
attributes.name: Bored Man

attributes.content: Collections exist to be admired by someone who truly appreciates their beauty, not to be bought or sold.
attributes.name: Bored Man

attributes.content: So you're one of the uncouth fools too... I guess there's nothing for us to talk about.
attributes.name: Bored Man

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: That's enough, Pelipper.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Kahn?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I'll take it from here.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: You again... sorry, we're closed for today. Have a good one.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Be reasonable, Pelipper.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Siesta banned obsidian mining many years ago, but we're well aware that you know how to get more.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: We don't need much for the volcano research, and I'm not interested in all those ornaments you have. I just need a few that have been dug up from that volcano in the past two years.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: This is for Siesta. Come on, act like a normal person for once.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: There's nothing to talk about. I don't need you to tell me what's the proper Siestan thing to do.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Sorry, I couldn't...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: It's okay. Let's go.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Hey you, girl, one second.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: You look like you're easier to talk to than that bespectacled moron.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Have you changed your mind?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: My stuff's not for sale, but it just happens that I do, in fact, know a source...
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Thank you!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Don't tell anyone about this.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Of course!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Adele puts her foot forward excitedly, but her path is blocked by the sudden appearance of a creature.
The Little Black Sheep before her strolls leisurely towards the shop's exit while chewing on an old Siestan sign.
Suddenly, its steps slow as it sets its eyes on the sign outside the hot spring resort. It opens its mouth, bites a chunk out of the address, then continues its leisurely stroll.
Hey, why are you eating signs and addresses?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Addresses...? Don't tell me you ate the address on the envelope?
attributes.name: Adele
